ComicInfo.Title: CYBORGS, BABOONS AND BEARS! OH, MY
ComicInfo.Summary: 'CYBORGS, BABOONS AND BEARS! OH, MY!' The action packed finale that will have you high-fiving and fist-pumping in public places. With the true villain revealed, the Intrepids must face their darkest fears and most powerful enemy. A full-scale epic brawl for the fate of humanity. Enter the cyber-bears!
